title: Validate Metric summary reset to 0  for all types after every 5 mins of successful send
custom_steps:
- Enable watson logging for smtpdem 5
- Review every 5 mins interval smtpdem tries to connect grpc to sen dout metric summary 
- After metrics are sent out successfully, It should have counter reset to 0
- Send new emails and this should have increment couter value from zero.
custom_expected:
- Enable watson logging for smtpdem 5
- Review every 5 mins interval smtpdem tries to connect grpc to sen dout metric summary 
- After metrics are sent out successfully, It should have counter reset to 0
- Send new emails and this should have increment couter value from zero.
